ygData.subject: please enough on twinking
ygData.msgSnippet: no disresecpt intended to all the messages on twinking, but we get your point now. many people think twinking is bad. many have no problem with it. both sides
ygData.messageBody:
no disresecpt intended to all the messages on twinking, but we get your
point now. many people think twinking is bad. many have no problem with it.
both sides make good points......

....but please remeber that this is message service is about monks, and not
twinking. a few messages ok, but i got all of your points.

yes i could just delete them, but i get this in digest form, and by this
point its a little annoying to scroll through 25 messages only to see more
than half not related directly to monk topics.

thank you.
